title: Cover Story: Vaccine Mandates for Kids
itunes:title: Cover Story: Vaccine Mandates for Kids
description:
This week's Cover Story for Bloomberg Businessweek:

"Vaccine Mandates for Kids Is the Next Big Back-to-School Fight" written by Riley Griffin and Suzi Ring.

Read by Bloomberg's Mark Leydorf.

Children have to get vaccinated for less urgent threats—and it works. So why not with Covid?

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
